sent.orig: Above rates include service charge, and include buffet breakfast at Traders Cafe.
sent.trans: 以上房价已包括服务费，且含三江咖啡厅自助早餐。

sent.orig: Where applicable, words in the singular include plural and in the plural include the singular.
sent.trans: 如情形适用，单数词形包含复数含义，复数词形包含单数含义。

sent.orig: These include include kitchen resesdevices, medicine bottles, ladders letters, newspapers, money and pieces of clothes cloth.
sent.trans: 这些物品包括厨具，药罐，信件，报纸，钱以及破布片。

sent.orig: Where applicable in the singular include the plural in the plural include the singular.
sent.trans: 如情形使用，单数词形包含复数含义，复数词形包含单数含义。

sent.orig: SME financing include not only bank loans, should also include equity investments and bond investments.
sent.trans: 中小企业筹资不仅包括银行借贷，还应包括股权投资、债券投资。
